problem.markdown: There is one inlet in an open system. What is the minimum and maximum number of outlets? ( ) Min: 1 max: no limit (x) Min: 0 max: no limit ( ) Min: 0 max: 1 ( ) Min: 1 max: 1 [explanation] A balloon being inflated is an example. [explanation]
problem.p: There is one inlet in an open system. What is the minimum and maximum number of outlets?

div.p: A balloon being inflated is an example.
